languages.text: "Так это ведь... вся наша жизнь, Ваша Светлость! Заберете вы нас и что мы делать будем — чернорабочими где-то в трюме сидеть? А здесь у нас своя колония, свое дело. Нет, мы свой путь не оставим".

"But this... this is our whole livelihood, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! You take us from here, and what are we gonna do — sit in some hold, slaving away? Here, we've got our own colony, our own operation. No, this is our path, and we won't stray from it."
languages.original_text: "Так это ведь... вся наша жизнь, Ваша Светлость! Заберете вы нас и что мы делать будем — чернорабочими где-то в трюме сидеть? А здесь у нас своя колония, свое дело. Нет, мы свой путь не оставим".

traits.locale_text: "But this... this is our whole livelihood, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! You take us from here, and what are we gonna do — sit in some hold, slaving away? Here, we've got our own colony, our own operation. No, this is our path, and we won't stray from it."
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

traits.locale_text: "But this... this is our whole livelihood, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! You take us from here, and what are we gonna do — sit in some hold, slaving away? Here, we've got our own colony, our own operation. No, this is our path, and we won't stray from it."
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

traits.locale_text: "But this... this is our whole livelihood, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! You take us from here, and what are we gonna do — sit in some hold, slaving away? Here, we've got our own colony, our own operation. No, this is our path, and we won't stray from it."
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

traits.locale_text: "But this... this is our whole livelihood, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! You take us from here, and what are we gonna do — sit in some hold, slaving away? Here, we've got our own colony, our own operation. No, this is our path, and we won't stray from it."
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

traits.locale_text: "But this... this is our whole livelihood, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! You take us from here, and what are we gonna do — sit in some hold, slaving away? Here, we've got our own colony, our own operation. No, this is our path, and we won't stray from it."
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

languages.text: “可这……这就是我们的生计啊，大人！如果你带我们离开这里，那我们还能做什么呢？坐在船舱里干活吗？在这个地方，我们有我们自己的殖民地，有我们自己的做事方法。不行，这就是我们的道路，我们不能一走了之。”
languages.original_text: "But this... this is our whole livelihood, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! You take us from here, and what are we gonna do — sit in some hold, slaving away? Here, we've got our own colony, our own operation. No, this is our path, and we won't stray from it."

traits.locale_text: “可这……这就是我们的生计啊，大人！如果你带我们离开这里，那我们还能做什么呢？坐在船舱里干活吗？在这个地方，我们有我们自己的殖民地，有我们自己的做事方法。不行，这就是我们的道路，我们不能一走了之。”
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

languages.text: «Pero esto... ¡Esto es nuestra vida, mi{mf|lord|lady}! Si nos saca de aquí, ¿qué opción tenemos? ¿Quedarnos en una bodega casi esclavizados? Aquí tenemos nuestra propia colonia y nuestro propio negocio. No, este es nuestro camino y no vamos a desviarnos».
languages.original_text: "But this... this is our whole livelihood, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! You take us from here, and what are we gonna do — sit in some hold, slaving away? Here, we've got our own colony, our own operation. No, this is our path, and we won't stray from it."

traits.locale_text: «Pero esto... ¡Esto es nuestra vida, mi{mf|lord|lady}! Si nos saca de aquí, ¿qué opción tenemos? ¿Quedarnos en una bodega casi esclavizados? Aquí tenemos nuestra propia colonia y nuestro propio negocio. No, este es nuestro camino y no vamos a desviarnos».
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

languages.text: 「ですが、これが…これが私たちの生業のすべてです、陛下！あなた様は私たちをここから連れて去って、そしてどうするおつもりですか。どこかの船倉に座らせて奴隷のように働かせますか？ここであれば、私たちは自分たちの居留地も、仕事もあります。いいえ、これが私たちの道で、ここから外れることはありません」
languages.original_text: "But this... this is our whole livelihood, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! You take us from here, and what are we gonna do — sit in some hold, slaving away? Here, we've got our own colony, our own operation. No, this is our path, and we won't stray from it."

traits.locale_text: 「ですが、これが…これが私たちの生業のすべてです、陛下！あなた様は私たちをここから連れて去って、そしてどうするおつもりですか。どこかの船倉に座らせて奴隷のように働かせますか？ここであれば、私たちは自分たちの居留地も、仕事もあります。いいえ、これが私たちの道で、ここから外れることはありません」
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

languages.text: "Aber das ... das ist unser ganzes Leben, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Wenn Ihr uns wegbringt, was sollen wir dann machen – wie Sklaven in irgendeiner Zelle sitzen? Hier haben wir unsere eigene Kolonie, unser eigenes Geschäft. Nein, das ist unser Weg, und wir werden nicht von ihm abgehen."
languages.original_text: "But this... this is our whole livelihood, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! You take us from here, and what are we gonna do — sit in some hold, slaving away? Here, we've got our own colony, our own operation. No, this is our path, and we won't stray from it."

traits.locale_text: "Aber das ... das ist unser ganzes Leben, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Wenn Ihr uns wegbringt, was sollen wir dann machen – wie Sklaven in irgendeiner Zelle sitzen? Hier haben wir unsere eigene Kolonie, unser eigenes Geschäft. Nein, das ist unser Weg, und wir werden nicht von ihm abgehen."
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

languages.text: « Mais... c'est notre gagne-pain, Votre Seigneurie ! Qu'est-ce qu'on va faire si vous nous emmenez ? Croupir au fond d'une cale, comme des esclaves ? Ici, on a notre propre colonie, notre propre opération. Non... notre voie est tracée et on n'en déviera pas. »
languages.original_text: "But this... this is our whole livelihood, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! You take us from here, and what are we gonna do — sit in some hold, slaving away? Here, we've got our own colony, our own operation. No, this is our path, and we won't stray from it."

traits.locale_text: « Mais... c'est notre gagne-pain, Votre Seigneurie ! Qu'est-ce qu'on va faire si vous nous emmenez ? Croupir au fond d'une cale, comme des esclaves ? Ici, on a notre propre colonie, notre propre opération. Non... notre voie est tracée et on n'en déviera pas. »
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

languages.text: "Ama burası... Ama burası bizim ekmek teknemiz {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Bizi buradan koparırsanız ne yaparız... Ambarlarda oturup köle gibi çalışalım mı? Burada kendi kolonimizle kendi işletmemize sahibiz. Yok. Bizim yolumuz burası. Buradan sapacak değiliz."
languages.original_text: "But this... this is our whole livelihood, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! You take us from here, and what are we gonna do — sit in some hold, slaving away? Here, we've got our own colony, our own operation. No, this is our path, and we won't stray from it."
